Class Server

      • listPayments

        public java.util.List<Payment> listPayments(Company company,
                                   int count,
                                   int offset,
                                   java.util.Date dateFrom,
                                   java.util.Date dateTo,
                                   Payment.Status status)
                                     throws ServerConnectionException
        Requests list of payments
        Parameters:
        company -
        count - number of payments requested
        offset - sets the offset for the beginning of list
        dateFrom - start date
        dateTo - last date
        status - payments status Payment.Status (all if null, Paid or Refunded)
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Payment objects
        Throws:
        ServerConnectionException

      • listPayments
